directions.step:
From: Wendy Lockman <wlockman@ra1.randomc.com>
Date: Thu, 21 Mar 1996 21:05:45 -0500 Mix juices. Beat milk in chilled bowl until almost doubled in volume. Add all ingredients; blend well. Freeze.
From _Our Best Recipes_ by Lena E. Sturges, Food Editor. Birmingham, AL: Oxmoor House, Inc., 1970. Pg. 132. Library of Congress Catalog Number 70-140493. Typed for you by Cathy Harned.
